channel.title: typescript on Thomas Coopman - Infinite Tree

item.title: Integrating bucklescript with typescript
item.description: Recently I’ve started using Bucklescript (and Reason) over Elm for various reasons (Something I might blog about later). In this post I’m exploring integrating Bucklescript with Typescript. Let’s start with a blank typescript project with webpack You can find the inital commit of a Typescript project here. There is nothing special in this commit, some npm dependencies: source-map-loader, ts-loader, typescript, webpack, webpack-dev-server. The ts-config.json file is generated with tsc --init, nothing is changed.
